trans-unit.source: Built-In Desired State Configuration Resources for Linux
trans-unit.target: Risorse DSC (Desired State Configuration) predefinite per Linux

trans-unit.source: Resources are building blocks that you can use to write a PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) script.
trans-unit.target: Le risorse sono blocchi predefiniti che è possibile usare per scrivere uno script di PowerShell DSC (Desired State Configuration).

trans-unit.source: DSC for Linux comes with a set of built-in functionality for configuring resources such as files and folders, packages, environment variables, and services and processes.
trans-unit.target: DSC per Linux include un set di funzionalità predefinite per la configurazione di risorse come file e cartelle, pacchetti, variabili di ambiente e servizi e processi.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides a list of these resources and links to topics that describe them in detail.
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente contiene un elenco di queste risorse, insieme ai collegamenti agli argomenti che le descrivono dettagliatamente.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxArchiveResource.md)">nxArchive Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Provides a mechanism to unpack archive (.tar, .zip) files at a specific path.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxArchiveResource.md)">Risorsa nxArchive</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: fornisce un meccanismo per decomprimere file di archivio (con estensione tar e zip) in un percorso specifico.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxEnvironmentResource.md)">nxEnvironment Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages environment variables on target nodes.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxEnvironmentResource.md)">Risorsa nxEnvironment</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: gestisce le variabili di ambiente nei nodi di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileResource.md)">nxFile Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages Linux files and directories.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileResource.md)">Risorsa nxFile</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: gestisce i file e le directory di Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileLineResource.md)">nxFileLine Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages individual lines in a Linux file.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileLineResource.md)">Risorsa nxFileLine</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: gestisce singole righe in un file di Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxGroupResource.md)">nxGroup Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages local Linux groups.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxGroupResource.md)">Risorsa nxGroup</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: gestisce i gruppi locali di Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxPackageResource.md)">nxPackage Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages packages on Linux nodes.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxPackageResource.md)">Risorsa nxPackage</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: gestisce i pacchetti in nodi di Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxScriptResource.md)">nxScript Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Runs scripts on target nodes.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxScriptResource.md)">Risorsa nxScript</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: esegue gli script nei nodi di destinazione.
<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxServiceResource.md)">Risorsa nxService</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: gestisce i servizi Linux (daemon).

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxSshAuthorizedKeysResource.md)">nxSshAuthorizedKeys Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages public ssh keys for a Linux user.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxSshAuthorizedKeysResource.md)">Risorsa nxSshAuthorizedKeys</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: gestisce le chiavi ssh pubbliche per un utente di Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxUserResource.md)">nxUser Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages local Linux users.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxUserResource.md)">Risorsa nxUser</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">: gestisce gli utenti locali di Linux.
